name: dfs.datanode.slowdisk.low.threshold.ms
description: Threshold in milliseconds below which a disk is definitely not slow.

name: hadoop.security.crypto.buffer.size
description: The buffer size used by CryptoInputStream and CryptoOutputStream.

name: fs.s3a.socket.recv.buffer
description: Socket receive buffer hint to amazon connector. Represented in bytes.

name: dfs.datanode.fsdatasetasyncdisk.max.threads.per.volume
description:
The maximum number of threads per volume used to process async disk
    operations on the datanode. These threads consume I/O and CPU at the
    same time. This will affect normal data node operations.

name: ha.health-monitor.rpc.connect.max.retries
description:
The number of retries on connect error when establishing RPC proxy
    connection to NameNode, used for monitorHealth() calls.

name: dfs.client.block.write.locateFollowingBlock.retries
description: Number of retries to use when finding the next block during HDFS writes.

name: fs.s3a.retry.throttle.limit
description: Number of times to retry any throttled request.

name: dfs.storage.policy.satisfier.recheck.timeout.millis
description:
Blocks storage movements monitor re-check interval in milliseconds.
    This check will verify whether any blocks storage movement results arrived from DN
    and also verify if any of file blocks movements not at all reported to DN
    since dfs.storage.policy.satisfier.self.retry.timeout.
    The default value is 1 * 60 * 1000 (1 mins)
